inclusion.criterion: hospital admission and scheduling for ICA
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: refractory angina or on-going severe ischemia requiring immediate ICA
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: patients requiring ICA < 24 hours after admission
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has history of CAD and prior MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. He was recently discharged after a negative work-up for syncope which included the implantation of a cardiac monitoring device.
